Project Code

TBA <!– I also strive to make the code underlying individual projects openly available.

The following project have openly available analysis code:

  • Single neurons in the human medial temporal lobe flexibly shift representations across spatial and memory tasks
  • Frequency band ratio measures conflate periodic and aperiodic neural activity
  • Parameterizing neural power spectra into periodic and aperiodic components
  • Methodological considerations for studying neural oscillations
  • Automated meta-analysis of the event-related potential (ERP) literature –>
